name: VM Blog CMS
summary: VMcms is a simple to use CMS for blogging purpose.
short_description:
It supports posts, pages, categories, comments, users/authors, and custom settings. There is a simple to use admin panel that controls everything besides three settings. Also, a simple installer makes the process painless.

Main features: (Demo)

    Can be used right out of the box.
    Installer script makes installation a breeze.
    Parts of the CMS include: posts, pages, categories. comments, users, and general settings.
    SEO friendly URLs.
    Custom fields in posts and pages.
    Open source code for further modifications.
